args: Five days have passed since Aldred\nand Andromeda encountered Grace.
No info on the Syndicate today, either.
Hmm. I guess she might have something.
Then we should go see her! C'mon!
Why do I get the feeling you're trying\nto hook the two of us up somehow?
She hasn't come out of her room\nsince she arrived at the inn.
She's not taking meals, and she won't\nanswer if you try to talk through the door.
I just... I don't know. \nI guess I feel bad for her.
Yeah, well, I ain't as nice as you.\nThat lady's Syndicate—she can die\nand stink up that room for all I care.
No, I get that—but I ALSO get that her\nlife was upended by the Syndicate just\nlike yours and mine were. ...Right?
Tch. This whole thing is a damn pain...
Hey! Lady! You dead in there or what?
What's with the mime act, lady?\nWhy ain't you talking?
Look, I'm gonna go grab dinner.
I'm hungry. It's dinnertime. If you wanna\ntalk or whatever, meet me downstairs.\nI'll hear you out there.
You're one stubborn son of a fiend,\nain't ya? Well, come down or don't.\nI'm gonna grab some chow.
I want to die, and yet all I can think\nabout is my empty stomach.
My heart cries out for release,\nyet my body screams to continue.
Why is it so desperate to live?

I don't really get your deal, lady—and I
sure as hell don't care for your attitude.
You're one of those people who tries to
push all their problems on someone else.
Aldred! Don't talk to her like that!\nShe's clearly troubled.
If you really want to do this thing,\nyou should eat up, regain your strength,\nthen come at me with everything you got.
In the physical and mental state you're in\nnow, you wouldn't be enough of a threat\nfor me to need lethal force.
Listen, Grace. He may be rude, but he's\nalso right: You should eat something\nand try to get your strength back.
You're asking me to live in order\nto be killed at a later time?
So how long are you gonna follow us?
You don't know when to give up.
Hello, pot. This is kettle. Nice to meet you.\n...Speaking of, where ARE we going next?
I got some info that the Syndicate set up\na research facility beyond the mountains.
If you wanna follow us there, lady,\nI won't stop you. Just stay the hell\noutta my way if you do.
Just a little more. Once we\nhead down the mountain...
Didja really think we'd let ya\nrun free forever, freak?
This was all a trap to lure ya to\nthis mountain!
So the information itself was fake?!
You think you guys caught me?\nWrong! You just saved me the\ntrouble of hunting you down!
Behold the dragon that slumbers within.\nYou will never forget this power!
Don't matter how many of you useless\nflunkies come at me, I'm gonna... Hrrrgh!\nD-damn! M-my arm!
You're overusing the dragon's power,\nAldred! You have to stop!
Don't try to suppress the dragon's power\nby force!
Feel the flow. Let it stream through you.\nThat is the purpose of wyrmbinding!
Aldred needs time. Let us stay here\nand protect him until he learns to\ncontrol his ability.
I'm good with that, but you—
How's it going, Aldred? You calm?
Yeah. When I try to use the power now,\nit actually feels sort of...good.
Yay! Also, it looks like the Syndicate\nhas pulled back, so I think we can\ntake a little break for the moment.
It would be a problem for me if you died.
You cannot very well end my suffering\nif you are not alive to do so.
Are you STILL on about that?
You guys really are two peas in a pod.
If you've got time to flap your gums,\nyou've got time to walk. We need to get\nsome miles in before we lose the sun.
Ah, my dear Grace. I've found you at last.
I WILL save you. I swear it.
